message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to sell it to you at this price today.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate your enthusiasm. However,  $18,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to pay $15,000 for the product, as that's my current budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $18,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $15,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $16,500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm still very interested in the product, but  $16,500 is still a bit outside my budget. How about we settle on $15,500? It's a fair price for both of us and allows us to close this deal.

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a decent profit. I can do $16,000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. This is a great opportunity for you to get the product at a discounted rate, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, we're getting closer!  I'm still not quite at $16,000.  Would you be willing to go down to $15,750?  It's a fair compromise, and I think we can close the deal at that price.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! I can see that you're willing to meet me halfway, and I appreciate that. However, I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to go down to $15,800, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. This is a great opportunity for you to get the product at a discounted rate, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, I think we're very close. Let's split the difference and go with $15,775.  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us, and we can finally close this deal.

I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on this deal. I can do $15,725, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. This is a great opportunity for you to get the product at a discounted rate, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
